thread.title: Energy Department Announces $11 Million to Accelerate Alternative Fuel Use in Medium- and Heavy-Duty Vehicles
thread.title_full: Energy Department Announces $11 Million to Accelerate Alternative Fuel Use in Medium- and Heavy-Duty Vehicles

title: Energy Department Announces $11 Million to Accelerate Alternative Fuel Use in Medium- and Heavy-Duty Vehicles
text:
15 Energy Department Announces $11 Million to Accelerate Alternative Fuel Use in Medium- and Heavy-Duty Vehicles 
EERE News: The Energy Department on September 10 announced $11 million in available funding to support the development and demonstration of innovative fuel-efficient technologies for medium- and heavy-duty vehicles.
